title: Full Stack Website Development
description: Scalable and secure full stack web apps built using modern technologies like React, Next.js, Vue.js, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, Express, SQL, Postgresql, mongoDB and more
intro: Build fast, secure, and scalable web applications from scratch with our full stack development services. We specialize in React, Next.js, Vue.js, PHP, Laravel, Node.js, Express, SQL, Postgresql, mongoDB and modern tech stacks tailored for performance and growth.
delivery: Our team handles everything from UI to deployment using Agile methodology.
why_astzo: We bring years of experience in full stack projects, offer flexible engagement models, and ensure timely delivery.

title: WordPress Website Development
description: Design and develop fully customized, responsive, and SEO-optimized WordPress websites tailored to your brand and business goals.
intro: Transform your WordPress website to match your brand, features, and goals — with zero code bloat.
delivery: We tailor your theme and plugins to match your branding and functionality goals.
why_astzo: We create lean, optimized WordPress solutions without unnecessary bulk.

title: Mobile App Development
description: Cross-platform Android & iOS apps built with Flutter and React Native.
intro: Reach more users with beautifully designed, high-performance mobile apps for both Android and iOS.
delivery: Using Flutter or React Native, we build and deploy robust mobile apps.
why_astzo: We focus on usability, scalability, and native performance across devices.

title: SEO
description: Increase website traffic and visibility with on-page, technical, and off-page SEO strategies.
intro: Drive more traffic and leads with SEO strategies that work — technical, content, and link-building.
delivery: We audit, plan, execute, and track SEO results monthly.
why_astzo: We combine SEO knowledge with developer expertise for full optimization.

title: Website Maintenance
description: Keep your website secure, fast, and up-to-date with our ongoing maintenance plans.
intro: Let us keep your site running smoothly with regular updates, security scans, and backup monitoring.
delivery: We perform routine updates, fix bugs, and share monthly maintenance reports.
why_astzo: Peace of mind — we handle everything so you can focus on your business.

title: Website Speed Optimization
description: Reduce load time and improve performance scores with advanced speed optimization.
intro: A slow website hurts conversions. We’ll boost performance, SEO, and Core Web Vitals metrics.
delivery: We analyze your performance metrics and implement targeted fixes.
why_astzo: We know what slows down sites — and how to fix it fast.

title: Custom WordPress Theme & Plugin Development
description: Build custom themes and plugins tailored for performance, SEO, and usability.
intro: We build custom themes and plugins from the ground up for full control, speed, and security.
benefits: Plugin functionality tailored to business needs
delivery: Our team follows WordPress coding standards and uses PHP, JS, and REST APIs.
why_astzo: We engineer scalable, maintainable WordPress solutions from scratch.
cta: Build a Custom Theme or Plugin

title: Frontend Development
description: Responsive, modern frontend interfaces crafted using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

delivery: We use React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS to craft dynamic, responsive interfaces.
why_astzo: We focus on performance, accessibility, and clean design in every frontend project.

description: Expert hosting setup, tuning, and server security for fast and stable websites.
intro: Ensure fast load times and high uptime with our expert server configuration and monitoring.
delivery: We configure and maintain your server with performance and security in mind.
why_astzo: We apply DevOps-grade processes for maximum server reliability.

description: We quickly diagnose and resolve bugs or broken features in your website or app.
intro: Broken UI? Functionality not working? We fix frontend and backend bugs with minimal downtime.

why_astzo: We’re quick, accurate, and transparent in our process.

title: Website Consultation
description: Get expert advice to plan, design, or scale your digital platform effectively.
intro: Not sure where to start? We provide actionable guidance on web and app strategy, tech stacks, and growth.

why_astzo: We turn confusion into clarity with industry-proven advice.
